item.title: Emacs windows resizing
item.description: Abstract Recently I’ve been introduced to the concept of a tiling windows manger. One key feature that caught my attention is how you can quickly resize your different windows and create your desired windows configuration with just a few executions of some keybindings. That got me wonder how it would really cool if I also have that in Emacs. I googled something like “resize emacs windows” but didn’t really (I didn’t want really) find package that can do that.
